page.title: 07FARMING IN NEWBIGGIN
page.content: GARETH AND ALAN WENT TO A{FARM} IN NEWBIGGEN AT SPITAL WHICH IS ON THE WAY TO ASHINTON. IT IS JUST PAST THE SHELL GARAGE.WHEN WE GOT THERE WE HAD TO KNOCK FIVE TIMES ON THE DOOR .HIS WIFE CAME TO THE DOOR AND TOLD US TO COME IN.WE WENT IN AND WE TALKED ABOUT THE{ANIMALS}THAT THEY HAD.WE SAW A COUPLE OF KITTENS SOME COWS, BULLS AND SOME CALVES.WHEN WE WERE LOOKING AT A COW IT WAS A GINGERISH COLOUR, AND IT STUCK ITS' HEAD THROUGH THE BARS, AND GARETH GOT A SHOCK BECAUSE IT NEARLY BIT HIS FOOT. A WEEK AGO A CALF HAD DIED.SO MR PERCY HAD TO PUT ANOTHER CALF IN TO KEEP IT COMPANY.AFTER SEEING ALL THE ANIMALS. WE WENT TO SEE THE{MACHINES.} HE HAD TWO COMBINE HARVESTERS,BUT ONE OF THEM DID NOT BELONG TO HIM IT BELONGED TO A FRIEND OF HIS .HE{PLOUGHS}HIS FIELDS ONCE A YEAR
